thread.title: Investors worth $1.5trn launch infrastructure sustainability benchmark
thread.title_full: Investors worth $1.5trn launch infrastructure sustainability benchmark

title: Investors worth $1.5trn launch infrastructure sustainability benchmark
text:
End date Investors worth $1.5trn launch infrastructure sustainability benchmark 
Investors representing $1.5 trillion of assets have teamed up with the Global Real Estate Sustainability Benchmark (GRESB) to launch a similar framework for infrastructure assets. To access this article please sign-in below or register for a free one-month trial. Login
